about_the_game: Welcome to "Tales Of Wakana"! Are you ready for an adventure filled with courage and excitement? In this captivating story, you will play as Princess Dian, who must prove her abilities by escaping the castle unnoticed and embarking on a journey to find the legendary Courage Gems. Traverse the continent of Wakana and encounter various characters, monsters, and events. "Tales Of Wakana" is an action-adventure game similar to Galaxy Castlevania, immersing you in a world full of mystery and challenges. On this vast continent, you will face a variety of monsters, each with unique attack patterns. Utilize your magical skills, including ice, electricity, and wind elements, to combat these enemies. Your weapons play a crucial role in "Tales Of Wakana" as well. By completing various ability tests and acquiring Enhancement Stars, you can strengthen your weapons, making them more powerful. The combat style in the game is incredibly satisfying, allowing you to defeat enemies using various techniques and tactics. Stay vigilant, dodge enemy attacks, and exploit their weaknesses to counter-attack. Each successful battle will bring you a sense of achievement and fulfillment. "Tales Of Wakana" opens the door to adventure and surprises. Are you ready to showcase your courage and wisdom? Join the world of "Tales Of Wakana" with Princess Dian, as you search for the Courage Gems and reshape the legend of courage! Note: This game is suitable for players who enjoy action-adventure, puzzle-solving, and exhilarating combat. Are you ready to face the challenge? Join the world of "Tales Of Wakana" and demonstrate your courage and wisdom!

name: Tales Of Wakana

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6550 or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6400+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GT, 1 GB or AMD Radeon HD 6570, 1 GB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: "Tales Of Wakana" is a thrilling action-adventure game like Galaxy Castlevania. Explore a mysterious and challenging world, battling monsters using magical skills. Uncover the true meaning of life, family bonds, and self-knowledge for an enlightening experience.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal
